content:
Hey I'm a little confused about worktrees
https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/building/suggested.html says that i can do
git worktree add ../rust2
and git worktree add -b feature ../rust2 master

if I ran the first one, how do I add new features in the worktree? do I just do
cd ../rust2
and then do normal git checkout -b?

@Joshua Nelson you may be interested as you want to write a git guide
yup! in rustc2 you treat it like a normal git repository

Joshua Nelson said:

yup! in rustc2 you treat it like a normal git repository

sweeet. great way to save on compile times
